original: Jonsson, John Wiktor, kommunalborgmästare, Nybro, f. 30/1/89 i Ma-desjö, Kalm. 1., av Jonas Peter o. Ida Jonsson. G. 18 m. Alma Ragnhild Johnsson. Barn: Gulli Alice f. 20. — Stud. v. folkhögsk. o. lantmannask. 01. anst. t. 27, föredr .’håll. o. organisatör 28-31, kommunalborgmäst. i Nybro fr. 34. Landstingsman sed. 23, led. av landst. förv :utsk. fr. 24, ordf. sed. 38, av dess sjukv:komm. 29-32, av byggnikomni. f. las :byggn. i länet sed. 32, av komm:fullm. 23-26 o. 31, av berednrutsk. o, kommind 24-26, ordf. i utsk. 31, led. o. exp:för. i stadsstyr. 32-33, sekr. i drätselkamm. 0. hälsovind sed. 32, ordf. i byggn:-nd fr. 34, led. av kyrkofullm., ordf. i tax:nd 32-39. Medl. av SAP, SSU, trä-ind:förb., fredsfören. Led. av avd:-Styr. i träind iförb., kassör 21-24, styr :-led, i Nybro’ arb :kommun 20-22,, ordf. 22-25, o-rdf. i lok:styr. f. ABF 23-28, led. i styr. f. Kalmar SAP verkst. utsk. sed. 25, omb :man 29-31, stud:led., föredr:håll. fr. 23.
translated: Jonsson, John Wiktor, municipal chief executive, Nybro, b. 30/1/89 in Ma-desjö, Kalm. 1., son of Jonas Peter and Ida Jonsson. Married in 1918 to Alma Ragnhild Johnsson. Children: Gulli Alice, b. 1920. He studied at Folkhögskola and Lantmannaskolan, employed in 1901 until 1927, as a speaker and organizer from 1928 to 1931, and then as a municipal chief executive in Nybro from 1934. County councilor since 1923, member of the county council committee since 1924, chairman since 1938, member of the health care committee 1929-32, member of the county building commission since 1932, member of the municipal council 1923-26 and 1931, member of the preparatory committee and municipal committee 1924-26, chairman since 1931, member and export manager in the city board 1932-33, secretary in drätselkammaren and hälsovind since 1932, chairman in the building committee since 1934, member of the church council, chairman of the tax committee 1932-1939. Member of the Swedish Social Democratic Party, the Swedish Social Democratic Youth League, the Wood Industry Union, and the Peace Association. Member of the board in the Wood Industry Union, treasurer from 1921 to 1924, board member in Nybro’s labor committee 1920-1922, chairman from 1922-25, chairman of the local board for ABF 1923-1928, member of the board of the Kalmar SAP workshop committee since 1925, delegate from 1929-31, study leader and speaker since 1923.
